article_title: Thank Siri on Administrative Professionals Day
article_text: You are the owner of this article.

article_metadata.author: Louie Castoria

og.description: Today is Administrative Professionals Day. If this comes as news to you, while you read this column at home after work, you already blew it, you thoughtless cur!
